powergrid.control

Class TaskManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.powerbot.core.script.job.Task
      • org.powerbot.core.script.job.LoopTask
        • org.powerbot.core.script.ActiveScript
          • powergrid.control.TaskManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.EventListener, org.powerbot.core.script.job.Job, org.powerbot.core.script.Script

    public class TaskManager
extends org.powerbot.core.script.ActiveScript
    Task Manager class for the entire plug-in.

    This method deals continously polling and executing Tasks from its Task Queue. This is also the ActiveScript class that runs in RSBot.

    The TaskManager uses RSBot to run.

    • Method Detail

      • getTM

        public static TaskManager getTM()
        Returns the TaskManager instance.
        Returns:
        the TaskManager instance

      • assignTask

        public boolean assignTask(Task t)
        Assigns a Task to the TaskManager.
        Parameters:
        t - the Task to assign
        Returns:
        true if the Task was not already in the TaskQueue, and has been assigned, false otherwise.

      • assignTask

        public boolean assignTask(Task t,
                 int priority)
        Assigns a Task to the TaskManager with the speicified priority.

        The Task's own priority is overwritten by the given priority.

        Parameters:
        t - the Task to assign
        priority - the priority of this Task.
        Returns:
        true if the Task was not already in the TaskQueue, and has been assigned, false otherwise.

      • onStart

        public void onStart()
        Logs a message to the console stating the TaskManager has started.
        Overrides:
        onStart in class org.powerbot.core.script.ActiveScript

      • loop

        public int loop()
        executes a Task from the TaskQueue.
        Specified by:
        loop in class org.powerbot.core.script.job.LoopTask
        Returns:
        an integer specifying the amount of milliseconds the caller should wait before calling this method again.

      • onStop

        public void onStop()
        Logs a message to the console stating the TaskManager has stopped.
        Overrides:
        onStop in class org.powerbot.core.script.ActiveScript

      • currentTask

        public Task currentTask()
        returns the currently running task.
        Returns:
        the currently running task, or null is no task is running

      • retrieveTask

        public Task retrieveTask()
        Removes and returns the next Task from the TaskManager.

        When this method is called, the Task will no longer be executed in the TaskManager.

        Returns:
        the next Task in the TaskManager

      • checkNextTask

        public Task checkNextTask()
        Returns, but does not remove, the first Task in the TaskManager.
        Returns:
        the next Task in the TaskManager

      • tasksPending

        public int tasksPending()
        Returns the amount of Tasks in the TaskManager awaiting execution.

        This does not include any currently running Task.

        Returns:
        the amount of Tasks in the TaskManager awaiting execution

      • clear

        public void clear()
        clears the TaskManager's queue and cancels the currently running task, if any.
